languages.text: "Когда культом Губительной жажды правила Синисториа, они вели себя более почтительно, но ныне старшая Суккуба ушла в тень. Теперь на арене царит Кикеросс, а в рейдах заправляла Тазарра. Наглая стерва и зарвавшаяся дрянь, под стать друг другу... Когда Тазарра сгинула, амбиции Кикеросс раздулись вдвое, и выносить ее стало совсем невозможно".

"When Sinisthoria reigned over the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, the Proselytes behaved with more respect, but the senior Succubus has since withdrawn into the shadows. Now Keykeross reigns in the arena, and Tazarra leads the raids. An insolent hag and a presumptuous nonentity, a perfect match... As soon as Tazarra drew her final breath, Keykeross's ambitions doubled. She became utterly insufferable."
languages.original_text: "Когда культом Губительной жажды правила Синисториа, они вели себя более почтительно, но ныне старшая Суккуба ушла в тень. Теперь на арене царит Кикеросс, а в рейдах заправляла Тазарра. Наглая стерва и зарвавшаяся дрянь, под стать друг другу... Когда Тазарра сгинула, амбиции Кикеросс раздулись вдвое, и выносить ее стало совсем невозможно".

traits.locale_text: "When Sinisthoria reigned over the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, the Proselytes were more respectful, but the senior Succubus has since withdrawn into the shadows. Now Keykeross has the arena, and Tazarra led the raids. An insolent hag and a pompous pest, a perfect match... Once Tazarra had breathed her last, Keykeross's ambitions swelled to twice the former size, and she became utterly insufferable."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

Now Keykeross reigns in the arena, and Tazarra leads the raids. An insolent hag and a presumptuous nonentity, a perfect match... As soon as Tazarra drew her final breath, Keykeross's ambitions doubled. She became utterly insufferable."

languages.text: « Quand Sinisthoria était encore à la tête du Culte de la Soif Fatale, les Prosélytes faisaient preuve de plus de respect, mais la succube s'est désormais retirée dans l'ombre. C'est désormais Keykeross qui règne sur l'arène, tandis que Tazarra supervisait les raids. Une vieille peau insolente et une moins que rien présomptueuse, quelle belle équipe... Tazarra avait à peine rendu son dernier souffle que l'ambition de Keykeross avait déjà doublé. Elle est devenue tout bonnement insupportable. »
languages.original_text: "When Sinisthoria reigned over the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, the Proselytes behaved with more respect, but the senior Succubus has since withdrawn into the shadows. Now Keykeross reigns in the arena, and Tazarra leads the raids. An insolent hag and a presumptuous nonentity, a perfect match... As soon as Tazarra drew her final breath, Keykeross's ambitions doubled. She became utterly insufferable."

traits.locale_text: « Quand Sinisthoria était encore à la tête du Culte de la Soif Fatale, les Prosélytes faisaient preuve de plus de respect, mais la succube s'est désormais retirée dans l'ombre. C'est désormais Keykeross qui règne sur l'arène, tandis que Tazarra supervisait les raids. Une vieille peau insolente et une moins que rien présomptueuse, quelle belle équipe... Tazarra avait à peine rendu son dernier souffle que l'ambition de Keykeross avait déjà doublé. Elle est devenue tout bonnement insupportable. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “当希斯索莉亚统治致命饥渴教派时，血腥叛党对我们的态度要恭敬得多，但那位老资历的血腥魔女已经隐退了。如今，绮克萝丝负责管理竞技场，而塔扎菈则负责领导袭击。一个傲慢无礼的妖女，一个自以为是的无名小卒，这两个人还真是物以类聚……自从塔扎菈咽了气之后，绮克萝丝就变得越发膨胀了，我已经受不了她了。”
languages.original_text: "When Sinisthoria reigned over the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, the Proselytes behaved with more respect, but the senior Succubus has since withdrawn into the shadows. Now Keykeross reigns in the arena, and Tazarra leads the raids. An insolent hag and a presumptuous nonentity, a perfect match... As soon as Tazarra drew her final breath, Keykeross's ambitions doubled. She became utterly insufferable."

traits.locale_text: “当希斯索莉亚统治致命饥渴教派时，血腥叛党对我们的态度要恭敬得多，但那位老资历的血腥魔女已经隐退了。如今，绮克萝丝负责管理竞技场，而塔扎菈则负责领导袭击。一个傲慢无礼的妖女，一个自以为是的无名小卒，这两个人还真是物以类聚……自从塔扎菈咽了气之后，绮克萝丝就变得越发膨胀了，我已经受不了她了。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Als Sinisthoria über den Kult des Fatalen Dursts herrschte, haben die Proselyten mehr Respekt gezeigt. Doch der oberste Succubus hat sich seitdem in die Schatten zurückgezogen. Nun regiert Keykeross in der Arena und Tazarra führt die Überfälle an. Eine anmaßende Hexe und ein vermessener Niemand, ein wahres Traumpaar ... Kaum hatte Tazarra ihren letzten Atemzug getan, hat Keykeross' Ehrgeiz sich verdoppelt. Sie ist vollkommen unerträglich geworden."
languages.original_text: "When Sinisthoria reigned over the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, the Proselytes behaved with more respect, but the senior Succubus has since withdrawn into the shadows. Now Keykeross reigns in the arena, and Tazarra leads the raids. An insolent hag and a presumptuous nonentity, a perfect match... As soon as Tazarra drew her final breath, Keykeross's ambitions doubled. She became utterly insufferable."

traits.locale_text: "Als Sinisthoria über den Kult des Fatalen Dursts herrschte, haben die Proselyten mehr Respekt gezeigt. Doch der oberste Succubus hat sich seitdem in die Schatten zurückgezogen. Nun regiert Keykeross in der Arena und Tazarra führt die Überfälle an. Eine anmaßende Hexe und ein vermessener Niemand, ein wahres Traumpaar ... Kaum hatte Tazarra ihren letzten Atemzug getan, hat Keykeross' Ehrgeiz sich verdoppelt. Sie ist vollkommen unerträglich geworden."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «Cuando Sinisthoria lideraba el culto de la Sed Letal, los prosélitos se comportaban con más respeto, pero, desde entonces, la jefa súcubo se ha mantenido en segundo plano. Ahora era Keykeross quien reinaba en la arena, y Tazarra capitaneaba los asaltos. Una arpía insolente y una doña nadie presuntuosa, la pareja perfecta... Cuando Tazarra exhaló su último aliento, Keykeross empezó a ser más ambiciosa. Se volvió completamente insufrible».
languages.original_text: "When Sinisthoria reigned over the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, the Proselytes behaved with more respect, but the senior Succubus has since withdrawn into the shadows. Now Keykeross reigns in the arena, and Tazarra leads the raids. An insolent hag and a presumptuous nonentity, a perfect match... As soon as Tazarra drew her final breath, Keykeross's ambitions doubled. She became utterly insufferable."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando Sinisthoria lideraba el culto de la Sed Letal, los prosélitos se comportaban con más respeto, pero, desde entonces, la jefa súcubo se ha mantenido en segundo plano. Ahora era Keykeross quien reinaba en la arena, y Tazarra capitaneaba los asaltos. Una arpía insolente y una doña nadie presuntuosa, la pareja perfecta... Cuando Tazarra exhaló su último aliento, Keykeross empezó a ser más ambiciosa. Se volvió completamente insufrible».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「シニストリアが「宿命の渇き」教団に君臨していた頃の改宗者たちは、もっと敬意をもって振る舞っていたが、シニアサキュバスは、それ以来影に隠れてしまった。今ではキーケロスがアリーナに君臨し、タザーラが襲撃を指揮している。横柄なババアとデシャバリな無能者、お似合いだ。タザーラが息を引き取るやいなや、キーケロスの野心は倍増した。歯止めが効かなくなったんだ」
languages.original_text: "When Sinisthoria reigned over the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, the Proselytes behaved with more respect, but the senior Succubus has since withdrawn into the shadows. Now Keykeross reigns in the arena, and Tazarra leads the raids. An insolent hag and a presumptuous nonentity, a perfect match... As soon as Tazarra drew her final breath, Keykeross's ambitions doubled. She became utterly insufferable."

traits.locale_text: 「シニストリアが「宿命の渇き」教団に君臨していた頃の改宗者たちは、もっと敬意をもって振る舞っていたが、シニアサキュバスは、それ以来影に隠れてしまった。今ではキーケロスがアリーナに君臨し、タザーラが襲撃を指揮している。横柄なババアとデシャバリな無能者、お似合いだ。タザーラが息を引き取るやいなや、キーケロスの野心は倍増した。歯止めが効かなくなったんだ」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'nın kontrolünü Sinisthoria almadan önce Zındıklar daha saygılı davranırdı. Kıdemli Sakkubus, o günden beridir gölgelere çekildi. Şimdi arenayı Keykeross yönetiyor, Tazarra da baskınlara liderlik ediyor. Küstah bir kocakarı ile kendini bilmez bir vasıfsız. Kusursuz bir birliktelik. Tazarra son nefesini verir vermez Keykeross, daha da hırslandı. Katlanılır gibi değil."
languages.original_text: "When Sinisthoria reigned over the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, the Proselytes behaved with more respect, but the senior Succubus has since withdrawn into the shadows. Now Keykeross reigns in the arena, and Tazarra leads the raids. An insolent hag and a presumptuous nonentity, a perfect match... As soon as Tazarra drew her final breath, Keykeross's ambitions doubled. She became utterly insufferable."

traits.locale_text: "Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'nın kontrolünü Sinisthoria almadan önce Zındıklar daha saygılı davranırlardı ancak kıdemli Sakkubus, o zamanlardan beri gölgelere çekilmiş hâlde. Şimdi arenayı Keykeross yönetiyor ve Tazarra da baskınlara liderlik ediyor. Küstah bir kocakarı ve kendini bilmez bir vasıfsız. Kusursuz bir birliktelik. Tazarra son nefesini verir vermez Keykeross iki kat hırslı hâle geldi. Katlanılır gibi değil."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
